portfolio_subtitle: Discover some of my works and projects
aboutme_content_p1: Hello and welcome to my website/portfolio!
aboutme_content_p2: I'm am a fullstack developer from Recife, Pernambuco, Brazil, with extensive experience and knowledge, specializing in web application development since 2010.
aboutme_content_p3: Starting my career in the Flash era, I have mastered a wide range of development methodologies and tools, communication theory, video editing and production, music and sound, design, and typography. My technical versatility and creativity enable me to deliver robust and innovative solutions.
aboutme_content_p4: I'm passionate about music, I have been playing various string instruments since my teenage years, and I have a strong connection to cinema, having studied up to the 7th semester of a film degree. In all my projects, I apply my four main talents: Logical Reasoning, Sensibility, Creativity, and Knowledge.
aboutme_content_p5: If you're looking for a fullstack developer who combines technical expertise with a creative vision, you've come to the right place. Let's create something amazing together!
